commit message: Prevent crash with configuration for hidden networks
Don't reuse Shell's between threads, so they don't get closed accidently
Mark the dummy broadcast message as read to avoid unexpected unread message notification
Add donation notification on upgrade / install
Prevent crash due to null log message
Display exit code and output when shell fails to start
Only attempt to mask missing packets if >=20ms
Sync serval-dna

Fix wifi configuration for nl80211

With nl80211 drivers, the network type is kept even when the network
interface is down, so the adhoc configuration test fails. Therefore, we
need to check the network state before.

Unfortunately, it needs an android-9 feature. But this is not a huge
problem: minSdkVersion is still 8, and devices with android-8 probably
don't use nl80211.

See:
https://groups.google.com/d/msg/serval-project-developers/JGN00i00nFk/AsDRQzWHVI0J

Added a button to the settings menu to allow the the user to change the MeshMS notification tone, and allow for other MeshMS configuration options
Updated the help file for settings
Prevent application crash due to sql errors
Merge remote-tracking branch 'mat/development' into development
Shift async peer lookup into PeerListService, don't bother if unreachable
First cut replacing meshms ui on new servald api
Only create a notification if there are more incoming messages, don't send empty messages

Various improvements to meshms implementation

- use new MeshMS2 service type
- allow manifests that have any service type
- display delivered and read markers as rows in the message list
Remove broken ui elements
Remove obsolete messaging database during install
Reduce redundant logging
Sync serval-dna

Merge branch 'origin/master' into development
